dunes-script-module.name: isSupportedNic
dunes-script-module.description: Checks whether the given object is instance of supported Network interface controller
dunes-script-module.script: return (nic instanceof VcVirtualE1000 || nic instanceof VcVirtualE1000e || nic instanceof VcVirtualPCNet32 || nic instanceof VcVirtualVmxnet || nic instanceof VcVirtualVmxnet2 || nic instanceof VcVirtualVmxnet3 || nic instanceof VcVirtualSriovEthernetCard);
